document_data.name: Brandagaeris
document_data.mainbody: '''Brandagaeris''' was a hero who was deceased in or before the 8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He was tall, tanned, and strong.
document_data.Personality: His choice in romantic partners was at the very least quite peculiar.
document_data.History:
He had been a hero of some renown.

By the {{YearlinkName|767}}, Brandagaeris had had a relationship with [[Saeraede Lyonora]], an apparently unique [[Netherese]] [[ghost]]-like experiment, and fed her his own lifeforce for three seasons. However, she'd drained him completely by the end.
document_data.Relationships: Brandagaeris had come to love Saeraede Lyonora, and fed her willingly.
